hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Initialization containers
docker ps present=`docker ps -aq -f name=mysql_prod_container` echo $present if [ -z "$present" ]; then echo "******************* dind not present *********************" docker network create dind_prod_network; docker run -d --net dind_prod_network --name=mysql_prod_container ymougenel/mysql_test_image; else echo "******************* dind present *********************" fi

present=`docker ps -aq -f name=tomtom_prod` echo $present if [ -z "$present" ]; then echo "******************* tomtom not present *********************" else echo "******************* tomtom present *********************" docker rm -f tomtom_prod fi docker run -d --net dind_prod_network --name=tomtom_prod -p 8888:8080 ymougenel/tomcat_dev:latest
